subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Detroit had another eighth-inning collapse as Delmon Young hit a pinch-hit, bases-loaded double, lifting Baltimore to a 2-0 lead in an A.L. division series.
snippet: Detroit had another eighth-inning collapse as Delmon Young hit a pinch-hit, bases-loaded double, lifting Baltimore to a 2-0 lead in an A.L. division series.
